mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medical_record (patient_no, registration_id, chief_complaint, present_history, physical_exam, diagnosis, treatment_plan, doctor_id, record_time) VALUES (#{patientNo}, #{registrationId}, #{chiefComplaint}, #{presentHistory}, #{physicalExam}, #{diagnosis}, #{treatmentPlan}, #{doctorId}, #{recordTime})
mapper.select: SELECT record_id FROM medical_record WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId} LIMIT 1

SELECT patient_no AS patientNo, registration_id AS registrationId, chief_complaint AS chiefComplaint, present_history AS presentHistory, physical_exam AS physicalExam, diagnosis, treatment_plan AS treatmentPlan FROM medical_record WHERE record_id = #{caseId}
mapper.update: UPDATE medical_record SET patient_no = #{dto.patientNo}, registration_id = #{dto.registrationId}, chief_complaint = #{dto.chiefComplaint}, present_history = #{dto.presentHistory}, physical_exam = #{dto.physicalExam}, diagnosis = #{dto.diagnosis}, treatment_plan = #{dto.treatmentPlan} WHERE record_id = #{caseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medical_item_apply (record_id, registration_id, item_id, apply_type, apply_purpose, apply_site, apply_time, status, unit, remark) VALUES (#{recordId}, #{registrationId}, #{itemId}, #{applyType}, #{applyPurpose}, #{applySite}, #{applyTime}, #{status}, #{unit}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT mia.apply_id AS applyId, mia.item_id AS itemId, msi.item_name AS itemName, mia.apply_type AS applyType, mia.apply_purpose AS applyPurpose, mia.apply_site AS applySite, mia.apply_time AS applyTime, mia.performer_id AS performerId, st.name AS performerName, mia.result_recorder_id AS resultRecorderId, mia.perform_time AS performTime, mia.result AS result, mia.status AS status, mia.unit AS unit, mia.remark AS remark FROM medical_item_apply mia JOIN medical_service_item msi ON mia.item_id = msi.item_id LEFT JOIN staff st ON mia.performer_id = st.staff_id WHERE mia.record_id = #{recordId} ORDER BY mia.apply_time DESC

SELECT p.prescription_id AS prescriptionId, p.drug_id AS drugId, d.drug_name AS drugName, d.drug_code AS drugCode, d.specification AS specification, d.unit AS unit, CAST(d.retail_price AS CHAR) AS price, p.dosage AS dosage, p.quantity AS quantity, p.status AS status, DATE_FORMAT(p.prescribe_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM prescription p LEFT JOIN drug d ON d.drug_id = p.drug_id WHERE p.record_id = #{caseId} ORDER BY p.prescribe_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prescription (record_id, registration_id, drug_id, dosage, quantity, prescribe_time, status, remark) VALUES (#{recordId}, #{registrationId}, #{drugId}, #{dosage}, #{quantity}, #{prescribeTime}, #{status}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT registration_id FROM medical_record WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
SELECT payable_amount FROM registration WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId}

SELECT msi.item_id AS itemId, msi.item_name AS itemName, CAST(ROUND(msi.price, 2) AS CHAR) AS price, mia.unit AS unit, CAST(ROUND(msi.price * mia.unit, 2) AS CHAR) AS amount, mia.status AS status, DATE_FORMAT(mia.apply_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM medical_item_apply mia JOIN medical_service_item msi ON mia.item_id = msi.item_id WHERE mia.record_id = #{recordId}

SELECT d.drug_id AS drugId, d.drug_name AS drugName, d.specification AS specification, CAST(ROUND(d.retail_price, 2) AS CHAR) AS price, p.quantity AS quantity, CAST(ROUND(d.retail_price * p.quantity, 2) AS CHAR) AS amount, p.status AS status, DATE_FORMAT(p.prescribe_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM prescription p JOIN drug d ON p.drug_id = d.drug_id WHERE p.record_id = #{recordId}
mapper.update: UPDATE patient_visit SET current_status = 'INITIAL_CONSULTATION_DONE', status_changed_at = NOW() WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId}
UPDATE patient_visit SET current_status = 'WAITING_FOR_PROJECT_PAYMENT', status_changed_at = NOW() WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId}
mapper.select: SELECT current_status FROM patient_visit WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId} LIMIT 1
SELECT registration_id FROM medical_record WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
mapper.update: UPDATE patient_visit SET current_status = #{status}, status_changed_at = NOW() WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId}
UPDATE prescription SET status = 'REVOKED' WHERE prescription_id = #{prescriptionId} AND status = 'PENDING_PAYMENT'
mapper.select: SELECT prescription_id AS prescriptionId, record_id AS recordId, registration_id AS registrationId, drug_id AS drugId, dosage AS dosage, quantity AS quantity, prescribe_time AS prescribeTime, status AS status, remark AS remark FROM prescription WHERE prescription_id = #{prescriptionId} LIMIT 1

SELECT p.patient_id AS patientId, p.patient_no AS patientNo, p.name, p.gender, p.birthday, p.id_card AS idCard, p.address, p.patient_no AS medicalNo, pv.current_status AS status, pv.visit_date AS registrationDate, mr.chief_complaint AS complaint FROM patient_visit pv JOIN patient p ON pv.patient_id = p.patient_id LEFT JOIN medical_record mr ON pv.registration_id = mr.registration_id WHERE p.patient_no = #{medicalNo} ORDER BY pv.visit_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT pv.registration_id, p.patient_no, p.name, p.gender, p.birthday, pv.current_status, mr.record_id FROM patient_visit pv JOIN patient p ON pv.patient_id = p.patient_id LEFT JOIN medical_record mr ON pv.registration_id = mr.registration_id WHERE pv.registration_id = #{registrationId} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE medical_item_apply SET status = 'REVOKED' WHERE apply_id = #{applyId} AND status = 'PENDING_PAYMENT'
mapper.select: SELECT registration_id FROM medical_item_apply WHERE apply_id = #{applyId} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM medical_item_apply WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId} AND status IN ('PENDING_PAYMENT','UNFINISHED')

SELECT mia.apply_id AS applyId, mia.item_id AS itemId, msi.item_name AS itemName, msi.item_code AS itemCode, mia.apply_type AS itemType, mia.status AS status, CAST(msi.price AS CHAR) AS price, mia.unit AS unit, mia.apply_time AS createTime FROM medical_item_apply mia JOIN medical_service_item msi ON mia.item_id = msi.item_id WHERE mia.record_id = #{recordId} AND mia.status IN ('PENDING_PAYMENT','UNFINISHED','FINISHED','CANCELLED','REVOKED') ORDER BY mia.apply_time DESC
